item.description:
• Do you crave more nourishing connection in your life?
  • Do you long to be seen and accepted for who you are?
  • Would you like to develop a sense of community with others on the spiritual path of embodied love?
  • Are you always on the go and yearn for quality relaxation and replenishment of your body and soul?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, this Oasis is for YOU!

In a safe, serene environment you will be guided into healing, nourishing connection with yourself and other like-hearted souls. We will incorporate  breath, movement, imagery, sound and safe touch to deepen your felt-sense of wholeness and connection.

You will experience a series of exercises designed specifically to tap into:

 

  1. Divine Love
  2. The intrinsic relaxation response of your nervous system
  3. Corrective experiences in the relational field

 

You will leave feeling:

 

  • Refreshed, peaceful and energized
  • Empowered with the knowledge and skills to access these states at will
  • Enhanced trust and greater ability to take in nourishment

 

Fridays, 4/20, 5/11, 615, 7-9pm

Open to all: singles, friends and couples. Beginners welcome!

 

Brynn Bishop, of the Center for Passionate Living, is a Love and Empowerment Coach with over 25 years experience in the fields of body-mind integration and conscious relating. Her passion is guiding people on the path of intimacy, freedom and fulfillment. Her workshops have been touted as “welcoming, enlightening, transformative, empowering, heart-opening and deeply nourishing.” Brynn is known for her wisdom, compassionate presence and mastery at having all aspects of the person feel safe and accepted. She has been called “Midwife for the Embodied Soul.”
item.name: Nourishing Oasis
